name: Space Survivor (LePatouPolaire)
description:
Description

Space survivor is a small endless shooter prototype Paul Tremblay and I made for school. The point of the game is to survive the longest and defeat enemies to get the high score. 

Weapons

You have different weapons at your disposal. Each weapon does a different amount of damage and has a different cooldown. You can switch weapons by pressing Q and E.

Power Ups

You can collect power ups to aid you in your survival. There is two type of power ups :

  • Health pack : Regenerates a small amount of health.
  • Super Bomb : Destroys all enemies.

You can switch power ups by pressing A and D.

Controls
  • The ship always flies towards to mouse ;
  • Left Click to shoot ;
  • Right Click to use power up ;
  • Left Shift to Dash ;
  • Q & E to switch weapons ;
  • A & D to switch powerups ;
